headline: The supermoon rises, bigger and brighter - in pictures
text: The full moon rises behind the Temple of Poseidon at Cape Sounion, Athens, Greece Photograph: Dimitri Messinis/AP       A person in front of the supermoon at Mount Eden, Auckland, New Zealand  Photograph: Simon Runting/Rex Features       A moon rises above an egret nesting area in Wichita, Kansas, US Photograph: KeystoneUSA-ZUMA/Rex Features       The full supermoon behind Christ the Redeemer statue in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil Photograph: Ricardo Moraes/Reuters       A palm tree and the supermoon in Los Angeles, California Photograph: Joe Klamar/AFP/Getty Images       The supermoon skyline in Toronto, Canada Photograph: Mark Blinch/Reuters       A runner makes his way along a trail at Papago Park in Phoenix, Arizona Photograph: STAFF/Reuters       Wrangler Nate Cummins rides by moonlight in Montana, US Photograph: Jim Urquhart/Reuters       The moon next to the Palace of Culture and Science in Warsaw, Poland Photograph: Rafal Guz/EPA       The full moon rises behind a mosque in Amman, Jordan Photograph: Ali Jarekji/Reuters       A full moon behind the minaret of Mohamed Ali mosque in Cairo, Egypt Photograph: Asmaa Waguih/Reuters       A full moon rises above Hotel Pere Marquette, in Peoria, Illinois, US Photograph: Adam Gerik/AP       Moon in the Early morning in Johannesburg, South Africa Photograph: Kim Ludbrook/EPA       The full moon rises behind statues of angels fixed at the St Isaak's Cathedral in St Petersburg, Russia Photograph: Dmitry Lovetsky/AP       The supermoon over Vancouver Photograph: Jonathan Hayward/AP       The supermoon rises behind wind turbines in Palm Springs, California Photograph: David McNew/Getty Images       The moon rises over the Cultus Mountain Sunset Road near Chuckanut Drive in Skagit County, Washington Photograph: Scott Terrell/AP
